publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3648 Ms Margaret Curran: Domestic Abuseâ€”That the Parliament approves the considerable progress made in increasing the protection of, and provision of services to, women, children and young people experiencing domestic abuse; further approves work aimed at reducing the intolerably high incidence of domestic abuse in Scotland, and welcomes the work of the National Group to Address Domestic Abuse in Scotland in tackling this unacceptable behaviour.Supported by: Hugh Henry*
